cz.ive.process
Class CommonProcessTemplate

java.lang.Object
  cz.ive.process.CommonProcessTemplate
All Implemented Interfaces:
OntologyToken, ProcessTemplate, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommonDelegatedProcessTemplate, DummyProcess, Exchange, NeverAtomicProcessTemplate, Panic, PermanentProcess, Say, Step, Wait
public abstract class CommonProcessTemplate
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProcessTemplate, OntologyToken, java.io.Serializable

Common template for processes. In all subclasses, you should override at least atomicCommit, atomicStop and atomicLength methods, to provide functionality no metter when they are called. For example, the atomicCommit should not expect that it is called exactly after the atomicLength returned time.

Author:
honza
See Also:
Serialized Form

AtomicCommitException

atomicCommit

public ProcessResult atomicCommit(ProcessExecution execution)
Description copied from interface: ProcessTemplate
Evaluates partial results of running process. The atomicLength should be called if the process is still running after an atomicCommit call. This method may be called at random time. No ProcessTemplate implementation should expect any relation whith value returned by atomicLength function. So the implementation is assumed to be foolproof as much as possible.

Specified by:
atomicCommit in interface ProcessTemplate
Parameters:
execution - information needed to execute the process
Returns:
result of the process execution

increaseLOD

public ProcessResult increaseLOD(ProcessExecution execution)
Description copied from interface: ProcessTemplate
LOD has been increased so that the process is no more atomic. It should commit itself as necessary.

Specified by:
increaseLOD in interface ProcessTemplate
Parameters:
execution - information needed to execute the process
Returns:
result of the process execution

decreaseLOD

public void decreaseLOD(ProcessExecution execution)
Description copied from interface: ProcessTemplate
LOD has been decreased so that the process ceases to exist It should commit itself as necessary.

Specified by:
decreaseLOD in interface ProcessTemplate
Parameters:
execution - information needed to execute the process

atomicStop

public ProcessResult atomicStop(ProcessExecution execution)
Description copied from interface: ProcessTemplate
Called to stop the running process. This may not be an instant. If the process is still running, than the atomicLength should be called to retrieve updated run time estimate.

Specified by:
atomicStop in interface ProcessTemplate
Parameters:
execution - information needed to execute the process
Returns:
result of the process execution

isDelegated in interface ProcessTemplate
Returns:
True when the process is delegated; false in any other case.

isRendezvous

public boolean isRendezvous()
Description copied from interface: ProcessTemplate
Is this template for a rendezvous process? Interpreter acts as usual, but also waits if the source "who" became an actor of the same process with the current actor substituted to the "who" source of the second process. If this happens, the iterpreter calls method rendezvous(two processes that have successfully met) on the iface RendezvousProcesTemplate.

Specified by:
isRendezvous in interface ProcessTemplate
Returns:
true if this is template for the rendezvous process.

getSourceObject

protected IveObject getSourceObject(java.lang.String role,
                                    boolean real,
                                    ProcessExecution pe)
Helper method for easier getting of IveObjects from sources.

Parameters:
role - Role of the sources to be retrieved.
real - true iff we wnat the real object, otherwise it is false.
pe - ProcessExecution with info about sources substitution.
Returns:
requested source object or null if not present in the substitution on any level of indirection.

getCheckedSourceObject

protected IveObject getCheckedSourceObject(java.lang.String role,
                                           boolean real,
                                           ProcessExecution pe)
                                    throws AtomicCommitException
Helper method for easier getting of IveObjects from sources. If the returned Object would be null it throws an exception This exception is typically caught by atomicCommit and causes process failure.

Parameters:
role - Role of the sources to be retrieved.
real - true iff we wnat the real object, otherwise it is false.
pe - ProcessExecution with info about sources substitution.
Returns:
requested source object or null if not present in the substitution on any level of indirection.
Throws:
AtomicCommitException

getCheckedSourceObject

protected IveObject getCheckedSourceObject(java.lang.String role,
                                           java.lang.String objClass,
                                           boolean real,
                                           ProcessExecution pe)
                                    throws AtomicCommitException
Helper method for easier getting of IveObjects from sources. If the returned Object would be null it throws an exception. Moreover it checks the class of the object and throws an exception if this check fails This exception is typically caught by atomicCommit and causes process failure.

Parameters:
role - Role of the sources to be retrieved.
real - true iff we wnat the real object, otherwise it is false.
pe - ProcessExecution with info about sources substitution.
Returns:
requested source object or null if not present in the substitution on any level of indirection.
Throws:
AtomicCommitException

getCheckedParameter

protected java.lang.Object getCheckedParameter(java.lang.String name,
                                               java.lang.String paramOntology,
                                               ProcessExecution pe)
                                        throws AtomicCommitException
Helper method for easier getting the parameter in particular ontology from process execution. If there is no such parameter or it does not support given ontology an exception is thrown. This exception is typically caught by atomicCommit and causes process failure.

Parameters:
name - parameter name
paramOntology - parameter ontology
pe - ProcessExecution with info about sources substitution.
Returns:
object returned by the ontology token that holds wanted parameter
Throws:
AtomicCommitException

Parameters:
role - Role of the sources to be retrieved.
pe - ProcessExecution with info about sources substitution.

createObject

protected IveObject createObject(IveObject obj,
                                 java.lang.String solidName,
                                 java.lang.String templateName)
                          throws AtomicCommitException
Create a new object.

Parameters:
obj - object that wants to create another object; typically actor. It is used as parent of new object and for logging
solidName - part of new object name. It is concated by _tmp and random value.
templateName - name of template used to create new object
Throws:
AtomicCommitException
